LanguageData.VAEWaste_Wastedeer.label: wastedeer
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Wastedeer.description: The Wastedeer is a unique creature adapted to thrive in the most polluted of environments. With two heads, it is capable of detecting and avoiding danger from all directions. Its mutated form has allowed it to survive in even the harshest of conditions, making it a symbol of resilience in a world ravaged by toxins. Despite its unusual appearance, the wastedeer is a graceful and nimble creature, easily navigating the treacherous terrain of the wasteland. Though it may not pose a direct threat, its presence serves as a reminder of the dangers of a world overrun by pollution.
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Wastedeer.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Wastedeer.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Wastedeer.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Wastedeer.tools.3.label: head
